title: Illustrative font suggestions?
content:
Hi all,

Can anyone suggest a good illustrative typeface similar in style to this custom, hand-painted lettering from Australian illustrator Jeff Fisher?

Thanks in advance.

Scott

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 8.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024013017/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%208_0.jpg) | 59.58 KB |
author: sdiddy

comments.content: Maybe something in [Serifs by hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024013017/http:/typographi.com/000737.php) at Typographi.com
LettError's [Salmiak](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024013017/http:/www.letterror.com/catalog/salmiak/index.html) might be heavier than you want. Great fun though.
